Body: Hi as my topic says my phone is broken, xperia mini pro, both the touchscreen and the buttons on the phone doesnt work, but the phone does start and some functions like the keyboard is still working i can still call and stuff like that. But so far as i now i can't copy my contacts to my new smartphone. Beacuse i cant access the menu to copy the files from internal memory to the sd-card or sim-card. would be really greatfull for any help at all.
Title: How to copy my contacts with a broken touchscreen and buttons to the computer

history.Text: Hi as my topic says my phone is broken, xperia mini pro, both the touchscreen and the buttons on the phone doesnt work, but the phone does start and some functions like the keyboard is still working i can still call and stuff like that. But so far as i now i can't copy my contacts to my new smartphone. Beacuse i cant access the menu to copy the files from internal memory to the sd-card or sim-card. would be really greatfull for any help at all.
